long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can see your qibla direction line on the online map and find your qibla direction in a practical way. With this plugin, you will be able to quickly and easily determine the Qibla direction of your location. You can use this plugin to find out or confirm the Qibla direction of your home or workplace.

The "Qibla Direction Online" plugin gives your Qibla direction line based on your browser location. Therefore, it is very important that your browser's location feature is active for the correct result. The qibla direction line of your browser location is given to you instantly. To find the Qibla direction for a different location, you will need to manually enter the latitude and longitude addresses above.
